how_it_works: User input is reflected directly into the HTML response without encoding. The browser interprets the script tag and executes JavaScript.
why_filters_fail: Simple filters may only check for keywords and ignore context.
defensive_note: Use output encoding and context-aware escaping.

how_it_works: The payload breaks out of an HTML attribute and injects an event handler that executes JavaScript when triggered.
why_filters_fail: Filters may not properly sanitize attribute contexts.
defensive_note: Validate input and encode attributes properly.

how_it_works: Client-side JavaScript inserts untrusted input into a script context, allowing injected code execution.
why_filters_fail: Server-side filtering does not protect against client-side DOM manipulation.
defensive_note: Avoid unsafe JavaScript sinks like innerHTML and eval.
